error.upload-photo-lbl: Sorry, an error occurred uploading that photo.

dialogs.delete-scan: Are you sure want to remove the badge scan for
dialogs.confirm-photo-delete: Are you sure you want to remove this photo?

general.ngatl-text-msg: Hi, this ngAtl conference is awesome! I wanted to reach out and say hello.

user.already-scanned: You have already scanned the wonderfully delightful
user.already-claimed: This badge has already been claimed. If this is your badge, please send email to info@ng-atl.org and we will correct this for you.
user.scan-yourself: Well this sure is fun isn't it :) You have already claimed this badge silly pants.
user.unclaim-confirm: Are you sure you would like to unclaim this badge? This will make it available for someone else to claim.
user.unsaved: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to exit without saving?
user.name: Name
user.not-found: A badge was not found in our database for this barcode.
user.email-confirm-compose: Would you like to compose an email to them now? This will close this modal to open the compose view.
user.sms-confirm-compose: Would you like to compose a text message to them now? This will close this modal to open the compose view.

audio.no-file: There is no recording to play.
audio.transcribe-error: We're sorry, transcription failed. That was either some wacky conversation or somehow crypto currencies are involved in bringing down the entire web.
